name: git-ai-committer
description: Automatically generates commit messages and commits changes using AI

gitAiCommitter.preferredAIProvider.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Required**: You must explicitly select an AI provider. Use the command `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` for configuration.

Preferred AI provider for generating commit messages
gitAiCommitter.preferredAIProvider.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration
enumDescriptions: Use Editor Built-in AI (Copilot) for commit messages
Use Google Gemini for commit messages

gitAiCommitter.primaryProviderModel.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Model to use with the primary AI provider (optional, defaults to provider's default)
gitAiCommitter.primaryProviderModel.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

First backup AI provider if primary fails
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1Model.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Model to use with the first backup AI provider (optional, defaults to provider's default)
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1Model.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Second backup AI provider if primary and first backup fail
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2Model.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Model to use with the second backup AI provider (optional, defaults to provider's default)
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2Model.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
